All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PreviewFileChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser

This is a file chooser with a preview area.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form

Overrides:

addCodec

public void addCodec(Codec codec)
Inserts a choosable codec to this file chooser. A file filter will be created automatically for the specified codec.

Parameters:
codec - a codec to be inserted

setDefaultCodec

public void setDefaultCodec(Codec codec)
Sets the default codec. The file filter of the specified codec will become the default file filter.

Parameters:
codec - a codec to become the default codec

setFileSizeLimit

public void setFileSizeLimit(long size)
Sets the size limit of the files to be previewed. Any file with size larger than the specified size will not be previewed.

Parameters:
size - the size limit of the files to be previewed
